name: Alien Glow Fluid Experiment
description:
You are an Alien landing on Earth for the first time.

Your task is to find out what Alien's Glowing Fluid can do!

Featuring 9 interesting locations for you to experiment!

Spray the fluid in the flowerpot and the flower grows magically!

Spray the fluid in the drain, hold the fluid for 1 second to prevent overflowing!

Save the environment, save the Earth by... not dirtying the floor!
A handy advance alien tech: "Fluid Fill Rate Meter" shows you how "accurate" you are!

Features:
★5 difficulties
★9 locations
★funny sound effects

Funniest game in the App Store.
Download and start the Alien experiment now!
